RelatedSentence: Mareeg.com - African Union peacekeepers of AMISOM and the Somali National Army fought against Al - Shabaab terrorist insurgents in Qoryole district of Lower Shabelle region this afternoon .

A0: Al-Shabaab terrorist insurgents in Qoryole district of Lower Shabelle region
RelatedSentence: The terrorist insurgents attacked the government troops and peacekeepers .
Witnesses reported that the fight went on for at least a few hours .
The government soldiers seized the town after the lengthy confrontation near Qoryoley .
Ganey Abdi Barre , a government official in Lower Shabelle region said to Shabelle that during today 's batte , a senior official of Al - Shabaab named Sheikh Abdirashid Baka was killed .
